original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sayanagatassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū sayana gatassa dhammaṃ desenti pe

original: “Na sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na sayana gatassa a gilānassa dhammam desessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati
na sayana gatassa a gilānassa dhammaḥ desetabbo

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca antamaso chamāyampi nipannassa sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca antamaso chamāyam pi nipannassa sayana gatassa a gilānassa dhammaṃ deseti āpatti dukkaṭassa
